稯字的基本解释

稯
zōng
古代计算禾束的单位，四十把为一稯。
布八十缕为稯，即一种粗布。

稯
zǒng
〔稯稯〕聚集，如“其邻有夫妻臣妾登极者，子路曰：‘是稯稯何为者邪？’”

稯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zōng］
［《廣韻》子紅切，平東，精。］
(1)古代计算禾把的单位。四十把为一稯。
(2)通“緵”。古代计量织物经线密度的单位。八十缕为一稯。
[②]［zǒng］
［《集韻》祖動切，上蕫，精。］
见“稯2稯”。

稯字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　稯； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页856第21
【唐韻】子紅切【集韻】【韻會】祖叢切，?音鬉。禾束。【韻會】周禮，四秉曰筥，十筥曰稯，十稯曰秅。稯猶束也。論語註：六百四十斛曰稯。○按《說文》稯布八十縷。徐鍇正之曰：此卽十筥稯也。蓋言非八十縷布也，諸韻書皆釋稯爲八十縷布，誤。《集韻》通作緵總，亦非。　又【集韻】祖動切，音總。禾聚束也。【莊子·則陽篇】是稯稯者，何爲者耶。【註】稯，聚貌。

稯字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
稯字的起名意思

暂无。

稯
Basic explanation of words
稯
zōng
In ancient times, the unit for calculating the bundle of grains was forty bundles as a sliver.
Eighty strands of cloth are barley, which is a kind of coarse cloth.
稯
zǒng
[稯稯] gather together, such as "the neighbor has a husband and wife, a concubine, and a concubine, and Zilu said: ‘What is the evil?’"
稯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zōng］
["Guangyun" sub-red cut, flat east, fine. ]
(1) The unit used to calculate the bar in ancient times. Forty handles are one rod.
(2) Through "緵". An ancient unit for measuring the warp density of fabrics. Eighty strands are one rod.
[②]［zǒng］
["Jiyun" ancestor cut, stirrup, fine. ]
See "稯 2稯".
稯
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [He Zi Department] 　稯; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 856 21
[Tang Yun] Zi Hongqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Ancestral Congqie,? Yin 鬉. Wo bundle. [Rhyme Meeting] In Zhouli, the four bins are called 筥, the ten 筥 is called 筥, and the ten 稯 is called 筥. The stubble is still bundled. The Analects of Confucius: Six hundred and forty Hu said 稯. ○According to "Suowen" 80 threads of cloth. Xu Kaizheng said: This is also a ten 筥筥稯. The cover is not eighty threads of cloth, and all rhyme books all explain the eighty threads of cloth, which is wrong. "Ji Yun" is a master of all works, and it is not.　[Jiyun] The ancestor moves and cuts, the sound is always the same. He bunch also. 【Zhuangzi·Zeyang Article】Is a sculptor, what is it for? [Note] 稯, gather appearance.
